Package edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.controller

Interface Summary
InputListener The interface InputListener defines functions for reacting to events caused by user input by changing the model accordingly and thus ensuring that the view receives all information necessary.
MapListener Classes that implement this interface are used to react to certain events on the map by changing the model accordingly and updating the view if necessary.
POIListener Classes that implement this interfaces are used to react to events that originate from POIs by changing the model accordingly and updating the view if necessary.
 

Class Summary
ControllerUtil Contains some useful help functions used by all controller classes.
DefaultModelValues Initializes and manages the default values.
Initializer Class to initialize all necessary classes and data structures.
InputListenerAdapter Provides JSF-/view specific methods for reacting to user input.
InputListenerAdapter.CategoryEntry Stores a category and a boolean indicating if the category is currently active or not.
InputListenerImpl Implements the interface InputListener.
MapListenerImpl Implements the interface MapListener
POIListenerImpl Implements POIListener
StartupEventListener Listens to the startup events and calls the initialization method of the KITCampusGuide.
